one...\""},{"lineNumber":152205,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、坊主」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, kid.\""},{"lineNumber":152206,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ？　俺のことか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? You mean me?"},{"lineNumber":152207,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様を坊主扱いするとはいい度胸じゃ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"You've got some nerve calling me 'kid'...\""},{"lineNumber":152208,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":152209,"originalJapaneseLine":"ロレックスは真剣な顔でランスを見ていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rolex looked at Rance with a serious expression."},{"lineNumber":152210,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当にありがとよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you truly...\""},{"lineNumber":152211,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なんだと！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-What!?\""},{"lineNumber":152212,"originalJapaneseLine":"「正直、お前がルメイを倒しに来たって聞いて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Honestly, when I heard you came to defeat Lumei,"},{"lineNumber":152213,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺ァ不覚にも感動しちまった……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I couldn't help but be moved...\""},{"lineNumber":152214,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この恩は忘れねぇ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I won't forget this debt...\""},{"lineNumber":152215,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っと、男同士でこんな会話してても","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, it's creepy enough having this kind of conversation between men,"},{"lineNumber":152216,"originalJapaneseLine":"　気持ち悪ぃだけだな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"so let's stop this!\""},{"lineNumber":152217,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあっ、鬼畜ルメイの首を取りに行こうぜ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, let's go take the fiendish Lumei's head!\""},{"lineNumber":152218,"originalJapaneseLine":"意気揚々とロレックスが進み出す。","translatedEnglishLine":"With great enthusiasm, Rolex stepped forward."},{"lineNumber":152219,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あのー……ランス様……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh, um... Lord Rance...\""},{"lineNumber":152220,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当はルメイの偽物を捕まえに行くと知ったら、","translatedEnglishLine":"If you actually knew we were going to catch an imposter of Lumei,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「投下予定時刻は数時間後か……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The scheduled drop time is in a few hours..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃になったら呼んでくれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Call me when that time comes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この青空の下でまたたく閃光……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A flash flickering again under this blue sky..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 想像するだに胸が高鳴るよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just imagining it makes my heart race."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 常にどこか苛々とした雰囲気を発するルメイが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lumei, who usually gave off an irritated aura,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はどこか穏やかだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was somehow calm today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うえっ……なんだこりゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... what is this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同行する第5軍と将軍ロレックスの案内により、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Guided by the accompanying 5th Army and General Rolex,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は焼け野原と化した町に来ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others arrived at a town turned into a burnt wasteland.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これはただの寄り道だがよ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is just a detour, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴らの戦い方を見るのは無意味じゃねぇぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not pointless to see how those guys fight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これがヘルマンにいる魔軍の戦い方、ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So this is how the demon army in Helman fights."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 建物はあらかたが倒壊し、焼け焦げ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Most buildings were collapsed and charred,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見るも無惨な光景となっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: creating a tragic and pitiful sight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして街の至るところに転がるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And scattered all over the town were

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒焦げとなった人の死体。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: charred human corpses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍め、派手にやったようだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The demon army sure went wild."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それにしても死体の数が多いな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even so, there are a lot of corpses...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手際のいいことだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're efficient at this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「手際がいい、なんてもんじゃないぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's not just efficiency."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「村や町の周りから燃やして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They start burning from around the villages and towns,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 住民の逃げ場をなくしてから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: cut off the residents’ escape routes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間を念入りに焼きやがる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then meticulously burn the people alive..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奴らの破壊の目的は戦闘力の低下じゃなくて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Their purpose in destruction isn't to weaken fighting strength,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ人を殺すことだけ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but simply to kill people,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ってのがよく分かるぜ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's clear as day..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そこまでするこたぁ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There’s no reason to go that far..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ねえだろうによ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They really shouldn't have done that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひどい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Terrible..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思わずシィルが口を挟む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shiru couldn't help but interject.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「逃げようと町の端まで来て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Trying to escape, they reached the edge of the town,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 盛る炎とその奥で笑う魔物兵を見た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: saw the rising flames and demon soldiers laughing behind them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 民の気持ちは……どんなもんだろうな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder how the townspeople must have felt..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺ぁ、それを考えただけでよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Just thinking about that makes me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 淡々と説明するロレックスだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rolex explained calmly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その声は硬く、今にも怒りが溢れ出しそうであった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but his voice was stiff, as if anger might burst out at any moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これの指示を出した奴は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The one who gave the orders for this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔物大将軍ルメイ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'The Demon General Lumei.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この惨劇から分かるように……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As you can see from this tragedy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝つことよりも、殺すことに執着している奴だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he is someone obsessed not with winning, but with killing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのことから民の間では鬼畜ルメイ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because of that, among the people, he's called Fiendish Lumei,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆殺しのルメイとか呼ばれてやがる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or Lumei the Mass Murderer."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、可愛い女の子も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, there might even have been some cute girls,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一人くらいいたかも知れんのにな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but they probably didn't spare even one..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、坊主」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, kid."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ？　俺のことか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? You mean me?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様を坊主扱いするとはいい度胸じゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've got some nerve calling me 'kid'..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロレックスは真剣な顔でランスを見ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rolex looked at Rance with a serious expression.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当にありがとよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thank you truly..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんだと！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-What!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「正直、お前がルメイを倒しに来たって聞いて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Honestly, when I heard you came to defeat Lumei,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺ァ不覚にも感動しちまった……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I couldn't help but be moved..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この恩は忘れねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I won't forget this debt..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っと、男同士でこんな会話してても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, it's creepy enough having this kind of conversation between men,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気持ち悪ぃだけだな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so let's stop this!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあっ、鬼畜ルメイの首を取りに行こうぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, let's go take the fiendish Lumei's head!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意気揚々とロレックスが進み出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With great enthusiasm, Rolex stepped forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あのー……ランス様……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uh, um... Lord Rance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当はルメイの偽物を捕まえに行くと知ったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you actually knew we were going to catch an imposter of Lumei,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Lord Rance...\""},{"lineNumber":152220,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当はルメイの偽物を捕まえに行くと知ったら、","translatedEnglishLine":"If you actually knew we were going to catch an imposter of Lumei,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「投下予定時刻は数時間後か……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The scheduled drop time is in a few hours..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃になったら呼んでくれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Call me when that time comes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この青空の下でまたたく閃光……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A flash flickering again under this blue sky..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 想像するだに胸が高鳴るよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just imagining it makes my heart race."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 常にどこか苛々とした雰囲気を発するルメイが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lumei, who usually gave off an irritated aura,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はどこか穏やかだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was somehow calm today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うえっ……なんだこりゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... what is this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同行する第5軍と将軍ロレックスの案内により、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Guided by the accompanying 5th Army and General Rolex,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は焼け野原と化した町に来ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others arrived at a town turned into a burnt wasteland.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これはただの寄り道だがよ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is just a detour, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴らの戦い方を見るのは無意味じゃねぇぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not pointless to see how those guys fight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これがヘルマンにいる魔軍の戦い方、ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So this is how the demon army in Helman fights."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 建物はあらかたが倒壊し、焼け焦げ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Most buildings were collapsed and charred,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見るも無惨な光景となっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: creating a tragic and pitiful sight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして街の至るところに転がるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And scattered all over the town were

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒焦げとなった人の死体。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: charred human corpses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍め、派手にやったようだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The demon army sure went wild."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それにしても死体の数が多いな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even so, there are a lot of corpses...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手際のいいことだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're efficient at this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「手際がいい、なんてもんじゃないぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's not just efficiency."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「村や町の周りから燃やして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They start burning from around the villages and towns,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 住民の逃げ場をなくしてから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: cut off the residents’ escape routes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間を念入りに焼きやがる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then meticulously burn the people alive..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奴らの破壊の目的は戦闘力の低下じゃなくて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Their purpose in destruction isn't to weaken fighting strength,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ人を殺すことだけ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but simply to kill people,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ってのがよく分かるぜ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's clear as day..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そこまでするこたぁ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There’s no reason to go that far..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ねえだろうによ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They really shouldn't have done that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひどい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Terrible..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思わずシィルが口を挟む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shiru couldn't help but interject.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「逃げようと町の端まで来て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Trying to escape, they reached the edge of the town,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 盛る炎とその奥で笑う魔物兵を見た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: saw the rising flames and demon soldiers laughing behind them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 民の気持ちは……どんなもんだろうな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder how the townspeople must have felt..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺ぁ、それを考えただけでよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Just thinking about that makes me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 淡々と説明するロレックスだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rolex explained calmly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その声は硬く、今にも怒りが溢れ出しそうであった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but his voice was stiff, as if anger might burst out at any moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これの指示を出した奴は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The one who gave the orders for this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔物大将軍ルメイ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'The Demon General Lumei.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この惨劇から分かるように……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As you can see from this tragedy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝つことよりも、殺すことに執着している奴だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he is someone obsessed not with winning, but with killing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのことから民の間では鬼畜ルメイ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because of that, among the people, he's called Fiendish Lumei,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆殺しのルメイとか呼ばれてやがる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or Lumei the Mass Murderer."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、可愛い女の子も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, there might even have been some cute girls,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一人くらいいたかも知れんのにな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but they probably didn't spare even one..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、坊主」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, kid."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ？　俺のことか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? You mean me?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様を坊主扱いするとはいい度胸じゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've got some nerve calling me 'kid'..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロレックスは真剣な顔でランスを見ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rolex looked at Rance with a serious expression.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当にありがとよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thank you truly..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんだと！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-What!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「正直、お前がルメイを倒しに来たって聞いて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Honestly, when I heard you came to defeat Lumei,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺ァ不覚にも感動しちまった……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I couldn't help but be moved..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この恩は忘れねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I won't forget this debt..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っと、男同士でこんな会話してても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, it's creepy enough having this kind of conversation between men,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気持ち悪ぃだけだな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so let's stop this!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあっ、鬼畜ルメイの首を取りに行こうぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, let's go take the fiendish Lumei's head!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意気揚々とロレックスが進み出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With great enthusiasm, Rolex stepped forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あのー……ランス様……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uh, um... Lord Rance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当はルメイの偽物を捕まえに行くと知ったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you actually knew we were going to catch an imposter of Lumei,
